price: Lalle ne wannan, haƙĩƙa, shi ne lãbãri tabbatacce, kuma bãbu wani abin bautawa fãce Allah, kuma lalle ne, Allah, haƙĩƙa, Shi ne Mabuwãyi Mai hikima.
arabic: إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَهُوَ ٱلۡقَصَصُ ٱلۡحَقُّۚ وَمَا مِنۡ إِلَٰهٍ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُۚ وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: inna hādhā lahuwa al-qaṣaṣu al-ḥaqu wamā min ilāhin illā al-lahu wa-inna al-laha lahuwa al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
